name: df-xps
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cxps, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, co(ccnv(cmpo(s2, s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, cv(s1)), ccnv(co(csn(cv(s2)), ccda, csn(cv(s3)))))), cimas, co(cfv(csca, cv(s0)), cprds, ccnv(co(csn(cv(s0)), ccda, csn(cv(s1))))))))
comment: Define a binary product on structures. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.)
